dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2591 EH: To amend certain provisions of the FAA Modernization and Reform Act of 2012.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend certain provisions of the FAA Modernization and Reform Act of 2012.

section.header: Rollover of amounts received in airline carrier bankruptcy

subsection.header: Extension of time To file claim for refund
subsection.text: Section 1106(a)(3) of the FAA Modernization and Reform Act of 2012 (26 U.S.C. 408 note) is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2015.
Section 1106(c) of such Act is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)(A)(i) by inserting or filed on November 29, 2011, after 2007,; and

subparagraph.text: by striking terminated or and inserting terminated,; and
by inserting , or was frozen effective November 1, 2012 after Pension Protection Act of 2006.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 11, 2014.
